title: Pset_SystemFurnitureElementTypePanel
description: A set of specific properties for vertical panels that assembly workstations.. HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_Panel

HasOpening.title: HasOpening
HasOpening.description: indicates whether the panel has an opening (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).

FurniturePanelType.title: FurniturePanelType
FurniturePanelType.description: Available panel types from which that required may be selected.

NominalThickness.title: NominalThickness
NominalThickness.description: The nominal thickness of the panel.
